0.8.3.name: wordpress/wordpress-tweeter
0.8.3.description:
WordPress Tweeter tweets every time you make a new post on your blog. Please read the documentations before using this plugin, as the documentation provides all the information needed to use the plugin. The changelog, installation instructions, and any other plugin related information is there.

Features:

  • Choose a custom tweet template to use
  • Option to tweet even when a post is updated
  • Many tags to use in tweet template
  • Option to choose from many URL shortening sites
